me.name: Márk Munkácsi
me.title: Frontend web developer with UX/UI designer background
me.about: I'm a passionate developer, who is always learning and chases new challenges. I started my career as a UI designer + sitebuilder. Currently I'm working as a frontend developer for 6 years.
me.skills: As a professional I like to work with new technologies. My strengths are plain JS, ES6, frontend frameworks, React, Vue and frontend technologies like webpack, optimizing, SPAs, WebExtensions. When it's reasonable I like to use Typescript. I have experience (and I like) to work with high-traffic websites/webapps.

experience.name: Soter-Line Kft.
experience.description: I made redesign, improvement and making responsive of existing websites. I dealt with Wordpress themes, PHP scripts but mostly with client side stuff like JS, jQuery, CSS.

experience.name: Skawa Innovation Ltd.
experience.description: I worked on our main projects client side. Easyling app is a widely used online proxy translation tool. Our component based app was written in Angular 1, later in Angular 2 with Google’s Dart language.

experience.name: Ingatlan.com Zrt.
experience.description: Ingatlan.com is Hungary’s lead real estate site. Our team is developing component based responsive UI with Vuejs. Our own Vue component library is based on ingatlan.com’s style guide.

experience.name: Docler Holding
experience.description: At Docler I’m working on a desktop applications frontend. The app is written in C++ with an embedded browser as a UI. We use React with Redux-Saga.

education.name: Athéné Idegenforgalmi, Informatikai és Üzletemberképző Középiskola
Athéné Idegenforgalmi, Informatikai és Üzletemberképző Középiskola
